amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the requirement that financial institutions file certain suspicious activity reports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 4 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to eliminate authority to require "Know your Customer" profiling of accounts and source of funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 299 (Roll no. 269).
